agenda.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with
agenda.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Measures to combat terrorism will be high on the agenda.
be high on the agenda/be top of the agenda
The government set an agenda for constitutional reform.
be high on the agenda/be top of the agenda
Our Centre has limited its research agenda to four areas.
agenda.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the ideas that a political party thinks are important and the things that party aims to achieve
agenda.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
agenda.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a list of the subjects to be discussed at a meeting
agenda.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: the next item (=subject) on the agenda
agenda.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: New measures to combat terrorism are high on the agenda.
be (at the) top of the agenda
Energy efficiency is top of the agenda.
Immigration is an important issue on the political agenda.
Brown has an agenda for the university’s future.
The new government set an agenda for constitutional reform.
This incident has put the issue of racism firmly back on the agenda.
The meeting ended in chaos as representatives were unable to agree an agenda.
We need to establish an agenda for future research.
agenda.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a list of the subjects to be discussed at a meeting
agenda.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: What’s the first item on the agenda?
High on the agenda of today’s meeting of the G8 is global warming.
agenda.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a list of things that someone considers important or that they are planning to do
agenda.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The recent strengthening of the dollar - and how to stop it - should be at the top of the agenda.
agenda.translation[1].definitions[2].def: someone’s secret plan or aims, rather than the ones that they say that they have
agenda.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The union accused the company board of having a hidden agenda.
